testcase.name: WhereamiController GET /whereami should return "ip", "country" and "language" fields
WhereamiController GET /whereami when remote IP is passed in the request returns this IP in response
WhereamiController GET /whereami when country is found by IP returns correspondent country in response
WhereamiController GET /whereami when ACCEPT_LANGUAGE header is sent from client should return the most often used locale in response
WhereamiController GET /whereami when ACCEPT_LANGUAGE header is not sent from client should return nil for "language" field
WhereamiController GET /whereami when remote IP is not passed in the request returns "nil" for "ip" and "country" fields in response
WhereamiController GET /whereami when country is not found by IP (404 response) returns "nil" for country field
